name: Xander Classic: Aura of Harrben
description:
The updated follow-up to Xander: Ten's Darkness.... Ironically not updated at all since then!

  • Catch and battle monsters in real-time combat!
  • The shortest Xander by far- less than an hour!
  • 22 monsters down from the first game's 30!
  • More cringy meme dialogue written by a 14 year old almost a decade ago!
  • Why did I make this!
  • Why am I reuploading it and damaging my reputation!
  • Who knows!
